languages.text: "Э... здрасьте, Ваше Величество. Спасибо за пайки и воду, и что не дали сломать нам руки. Ведь без рук мы как без рук!" {n}Нэми неловко смеется.{/n}
"Uhm... Hello, Your Majesty. Thank you for the food and water, and for not letting them chop our hands off. That would've left us a little short-handed!" {n}Nemi laughs awkwardly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Э... здрасьте, Ваше Величество. Спасибо за пайки и воду, и что не дали сломать нам руки. Ведь без рук мы как без рук!" {n}Нэми неловко смеется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Uhm... Hello, Your Majesty. Thank you for the food and water, and for not letting them break all our fingers. That would've left us a little short-handed!" {n}Nemi laughs awkwardly.{/n}
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: « Hum... Bonjour, Votre Majesté. Merci pour l'eau et la nourriture... et merci aussi de les avoir empêchés de nous trancher les mains. Sans vous, on aurait sans doute manqué de bras ! » {n}Nemi pousse un rire gêné.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uhm... Hello, Your Majesty. Thank you for the food and water, and for not letting them chop our hands off. That would've left us a little short-handed!" {n}Nemi laughs awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Hum... Bonjour, Votre Majesté. Merci pour l'eau et la nourriture... et merci aussi de les avoir empêchés de nous trancher les mains. Sans vous, on aurait sans doute manqué de bras ! » {n}Nemi pousse un rire gêné.{/n}
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: «Ejem... hola, Majestad. Gracias por la comida y el agua... y por no dejar que nos cortaran las manos. ¡Andamos ya faltos de manos sin eso!». {n}Nemi ríe, incómoda.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uhm... Hello, Your Majesty. Thank you for the food and water, and for not letting them chop our hands off. That would've left us a little short-handed!" {n}Nemi laughs awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ejem... hola, Majestad. Gracias por la comida y el agua... y por no dejar que nos cortaran las manos. ¡Andamos ya faltos de manos sin eso!». {n}Nemi ríe, incómoda.{/n}
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: “呃……您好，陛下。谢谢您给我们的食物和水，也谢谢您没让他们砍掉我们的手，不然我们恐怕就有点人手不足了！”{n}涅米局促不安地笑了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uhm... Hello, Your Majesty. Thank you for the food and water, and for not letting them chop our hands off. That would've left us a little short-handed!" {n}Nemi laughs awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “呃……您好，陛下。谢谢您给我们的食物和水，也谢谢您没让他们砍掉我们的手，不然我们恐怕就有点人手不足了！”{n}涅米局促不安地笑了起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: 「その…こんにちは、陛下。食事と水、ありがとうございます。そして手を切り落とさせないでくれてありがとうございます。手薄になってしまうところでした！」{n}ネミは気まずそうに笑った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uhm... Hello, Your Majesty. Thank you for the food and water, and for not letting them chop our hands off. That would've left us a little short-handed!" {n}Nemi laughs awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「その…こんにちは、陛下。食事と水、ありがとうございます。そして手を切り落とさせないでくれてありがとうございます。手薄になってしまうところでした！」{n}ネミは気まずそうに笑った。{/n}
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: "Ähm ... Hallo, Eure Majestät. Danke für das Essen und das Wasser und dass Ihr ihnen nicht erlaubt hat, uns die Hände abzuhacken. Hände sind schon sehr praktisch, sie gehören nicht auf den Hacktisch!" {n}Nemi lacht verlegen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uhm... Hello, Your Majesty. Thank you for the food and water, and for not letting them chop our hands off. That would've left us a little short-handed!" {n}Nemi laughs awkwardly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ähm ... Hallo, Eure Majestät. Danke für das Essen und das Wasser und dass Ihr ihnen nicht erlaubt hat, uns die Hände abzuhacken. Hände sind schon sehr praktisch, sie gehören nicht auf den Hacktisch!" {n}Nemi lacht verlegen.{/n}
traits.speaker: InfernusSister

languages.text: "Şey... Merhaba Majesteleri. Yiyecekle su verdiğiniz ve ellerimizi kesmelerine müsaade etmediğiniz için teşekkür ederiz. Öteki türlü bir yanımız hep eksik kalacaktı." {n}Nemi, tuhaf bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uhm... Hello, Your Majesty. Thank you for the food and water, and for not letting them chop our hands off. That would've left us a little short-handed!" {n}Nemi laughs awkwardly.{/n}
